entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 12:02 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
